Down load data for three oryza:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
cd ~/dbcenter/OryzaRNAseq/glumipatula/
### Oryza glumipatula, leaf RNA-seq, PE, 101bp
wget get ftp://ftp-trace.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/sra-instant/reads/ByRun/sra/SRR/SRR117/SRR1174772/SRR1174772.sra
### Oryza glumipatula, panicle RNA-seq, PE, 101bp
wget ftp://ftp-trace.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/sra-instant/reads/ByRun/sra/SRR/SRR117/SRR1174773/SRR1174773.sra
### Oryza glumipatula, root RNA-seq, PE, 101bp
wget ftp://ftp-trace.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/sra-instant/reads/ByRun/sra/SRR/SRR117/SRR1174777/SRR1174777.sra

cd ~/dbcenter/OryzaRNAseq/minuta/
### Oryza minuta, leaf RNA-seq, PE, 101bp
wget ftp://ftp-trace.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/sra-instant/reads/ByRun/sra/SRR/SRR117/SRR1179197/SRR1179197.sra    
### Oryza minuta, panicle RNA-seq, PE, 101bp
wget ftp://ftp-trace.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/sra-instant/reads/ByRun/sra/SRR/SRR117/SRR1179198/SRR1179198.sra
### Oryza minuta, root RNA-seq, PE, 101bp
wget ftp://ftp-trace.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/sra-instant/reads/ByRun/sra/SRR/SRR117/SRR1179199/SRR1179199.sra

cd ~/dbcenter/OryzaRNAseq/nivara/
### Oryza nivara, leaf RNA-seq, PE, 101bp
wget ftp://ftp-trace.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/sra-instant/reads/ByRun/sra/SRR/SRR117/SRR1171629/SRR1171629.sra    
### Oryza nivara, panicle RNA-seq, PE, 101bp
wget ftp://ftp-trace.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/sra-instant/reads/ByRun/sra/SRR/SRR117/SRR1171631/SRR1171631.sra
### Oryza nivara, root RNA-seq, PE, 101bp
wget ftp://ftp-trace.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/sra-instant/reads/ByRun/sra/SRR/SRR117/SRR1171630/SRR1171630.sra

```

```{r, eval=FLASE}
source("lib/setUpslurm.R")
```



```{r, eval=FALSE}
### dump the SRA into fastq
fastq-dump --split-spot --split-3 -A glumipatula/SRR1174772.sra
fastq-dump --split-spot --split-3 -A glumipatula/SRR1174777.sra
fastq-dump --split-spot --split-3 -A glumipatula/SRR1174773.sra
```

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r, echo=FALSE}
plot(cars)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
